```lisp
[
  (:action create ; Create a setup and update its status
    :parameters (?p - person ?item - object)
    :precondition (and 
        (available ?p)
        (not (set_up ?item))
        (or (available_space ?item) (reflector_available ?item))
        (has_knowledge ?p setup_item)
    )
    :effect (and 
        (set_up ?item)
        (or (ready_for_photography ?item) (light_diffused ?item))
    )
  ),

  (:action attach ; Attach an item and update the state accordingly
    :parameters (?p - person ?subject - object ?target - object)
    :precondition (and 
        (available ?subject) 
        (ready ?target) 
        (not (attached ?target ?subject)) 
        (has_knowledge ?p attach_subject)
    )
    :effect (and 
        (attached ?target ?subject) 
        (ready_for_use ?target)
    )
  ),

  (:action experiment ; Experiment with various setups and subjects
    :parameters (?p - person ?setup - setup ?subject - subject ?tool - tool)
    :precondition (and
        (setup_ready ?setup)
        (tool_prepared ?tool)
        (subject_available ?subject)
        (has_knowledge ?p experiment_knowledge)
    )
    :effect (experiment_done ?p ?subject ?tool)
  )
]
```
